verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:15
verses.text: And he wrote in the letter, saying, Set ye Uriah in the forefront of the hottest battle, and retire ye from him, that he may be smitten, and die.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:16
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Joab observed the city, that he assigned Uriah unto a place where he knew that valiant men were.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:17
verses.text: And the men of the city went out, and fought with Joab: and there fell some of the people of the servants of David; and Uriah the Hittite died also.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:18
verses.text: Then Joab sent and told David all the things concerning the war;
